MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA1, WA4 and WA6 postcode areas of Warrington, affecting properties in Chester Road, Rydal Avenue, Burgess Avenue and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:24PM. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 4:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:55PM on 25th April 2021
